text: Ostraka is an academic journal published semiannually from 1992–2012 by the Istituto di studi comparati sulle società antiche of the University of Perugia in Perugia, Italy. It publishes research by professionals into the archaeology of classical antiquity. ==External links== * WorldCat entry Category:Classics journals Category:Archaeology journals
title: Ostraka (journal)
